suncertify.common.gui

Class AppConfigOptionsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • suncertify.common.gui.AppConfigOptionsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AppConfigOptionsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The AppConfigOptionsPanel class implements the configurable application configuration data display panel. The components displayed on the panel depends on the run mode specified in the constructor for the class.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Augustine Ogundimu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  AppConfigOptionsPanel.ConfigActions
      The ConfigActions class implements the callback for all the actions in the components used in this panel.
      private class  AppConfigOptionsPanel.DBFileFilter
      The DBFileFilter class is used as the filter in the JFileChooser component for the selection of file names for the database file name configuration parameter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AppConfigOptionsPanel

        public AppConfigOptionsPanel(AppRunMode mode)
                      throws AppConfigException
        All the components that constitute this panel are constructed here. The components constructed depend on the application mode specified in the argument to the constructor.
        • When the run mode is AppRunMode.STAND_ALONE - The "Database Name", "Specialities", and Instruction components are displayed.
        • When the run mode is AppRunMode.SERVER - The "Database Name", "Server Name", and "Server Port Number" components are displayed.
        • When the run mode is AppRunMode.NETWORK_CLIENT - The "Server Host name", "Server Name", "Specialities" and Instruction components are displayed.
        Parameters:
        mode - The application run mode.
        Throws:
        AppConfigException - If an error is encountered during the construction process.
        See Also:
        AppRunMode

    • Method Detail

      • addDBNameComponents

        private void addDBNameComponents(java.awt.GridBagLayout gridBag)
        This method adds the "database name" components to the panel. This includes the database name label and text field.
        Parameters:
        gridBag - A reference to the GridBagLayout object used in this panel as layout manager.
        See Also:
        AppConfigOptionsPanel(AppRunMode)

      • addInstructionPanel

        private void addInstructionPanel(java.awt.GridBagLayout gridBag)
        This method adds the instructions panel to the panel. This is just a label giving directions on what to do.
        Parameters:
        gridBag - A reference to the GridBagLayout object used in this panel as layout manager.
        See Also:
        AppConfigOptionsPanel(AppRunMode)

      • disableComponents

        public void disableComponents()
        This method disables all the components displayed on this panel. It prevents modification of the values displayed in the components.

      • enableComponents

        public void enableComponents()
        This method enables all the components displayed on this panel. It enables the modification of the values displayed in the components.
